name: Another New Year's Resolution
description:
Another New Year's Resolution

Description

It's almost the New Year and time for the same old New Year's Resolutions. You play a character that wants to get fit and healthy to ring in the new year. Run and collect organic fruits and veggies and blaze through 3 levels of this platformer. Try your best to stick to your resolution and try not to fall off it literally! 

Controls

"A" for LEFT

"D" for RIGHT

SPACE BAR for jump

Credits:

Music from Bensound.com, freesound.org

Pixel art created with piskelapp
